analysis.description:
Slotthereum.balances (/unique_chucks/21/0xfa0fe74319632eacbf009e846680e896ee4e2d02.sol#37-38) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getBalance (/unique_chucks/21/0xfa0fe74319632eacbf009e846680e896ee4e2d02.sol#201-208)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/21/0xfa0fe74319632eacbf009e846680e896ee4e2d02.sol#168:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0xfa0fe74319632eacbf009e846680e896ee4e2d02.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/21/0xfa0fe74319632eacbf009e846680e896ee4e2d02.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_minBetAmount' of Slotthereum.setMinBetAmount (/unique_chucks/21/0xfa0fe74319632eacbf009e846680e896ee4e2d02.sol#228) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_maxBetAmount' of Slotthereum.setMaxBetAmount (/unique_chucks/21/0xfa0fe74319632eacbf009e846680e896ee4e2d02.sol#234-235) is not in mixedCase
